runs.comm: waist high full toss to start, was it a no-ball, they've let it go, blocked out through square leg to get England away
full around middle stump, worked out to deep square leg
what on earth! This is a Harmison-esque wide but this is much wider, much wider, wouldn't have reached fourth slip! Hilarious
another leg side wide, at least this is vaguely close to off stump
full on leg stump, chipped over midwicket, nicely timed but that was another poor ball
via midwicket for four more, another lovely little clip, guided it past Kallis who had just gone into midwicket
gets one straight and is blocked down to mid off
this is more like it, nips away from back of a length and beats Kieswetter looking to run it down to third man
off stump half-volley, timed away past extra cover, lovely stroke, opening the face into the gap
might have missed out here, full towards middle and leg, tucked only to mid on

out goes middle stump! Length ball nips back and beats Lumb's attempted off drive, he was playing with the bat a long way away from the pads, didn't get his foot out to the ball and the quick, off stump ball seamed in and smashed down middle pole
length ball around off stump, angled down to third man
full and wide of off stump, driven lazily only to cover point
another front foot drive, this is better, but only to mid off
fullish ball towards middle and off, worked wide of mid on for a couple
angled in, comes off the thigh pad and runs towards square leg
leg stump slower ball, ran to the edge of the circle
slower ball bouncer, pulled down but only to short long leg, a yard either side it was four
angled in full, worked through square leg
cutter again, cut to cover point, they consider a single but Wright is sent back and has to dive back into his ground
down the wicket first ball, played into the empty leg side infield
step outside leg stump, Peterson follows him but goes too far
step to leg and back again there, it spun and Wright dropped it towards square leg
swept but can't evade the 45 on the leg side
leg side, it spins inside the keeper who went to his left to take it after Wright missed with the sweep, that did spin quite a bit, Levi dives and saves on the rope
this slides on and Kieswetter misses trying to tuck it to leg
towards the leg side again, another sweep, comes off the pad and loops over the keeper
shorter, pulled but only to deep midwicket
down the wicket, sharp spin down the leg side, comes off the pad and runs to the 45
down the wicket and hammered over the bowler's head, powerful strike, flashed away, good use of the feet
leg stump, swept past the 45 but deep backward square scrambles really well and saves the second, excellent work
goes to sweep, struck on the pad, huge appeal but not out given, Botha was convinced, Hawk Eye had it high and outside the line too

short run, just the one step, slugged high, high in the air and Amla takes it well at point. Good catch that coming across from short third man as Wright tried to go big over the top and skied it off an outside edge
back and waited for, tucked into midwicket from off stump
stepped to leg, tries to go over the off side, inside edge towards short long leg
down the wicket, worked via midwicket, no-one at home on the leg side in front of square in the circle
waited for in the crease again, played towards square leg against the spin
goes back to pull and gets hit on the body, that gripped and Morgan was there too soon with the stroke
swept hard, Kallis does well coming round from deep backward square
reverse sweep towards deep cover, it looped up but Parnell can't get there coming in off the boundary
slow again off the pitch, worked to point for no run
fired into leg stump, punched back to the bowler
short run again, goes to paddle sweep and only flicks it into de Villiers' pad, it runs to square leg for a single

turn down the leg side, Kieswetter falls out of his ground but de Villiers' drops the ball and the batsman scrambles back into his ground, but is the bat raised as de Villiers' eventually takes the stumps down, no, safely back, missed stumping
leg stump again, pushed to square leg
fired in again, Morgan can only dig it out back to the bowler
length ball on the stumps, Kieswetter steps away and goes to swing over the off side, gets a bottom edge back to the bowler
length again just outside off, nicely timed wide enough of long off for two, excellent running
another length ball, Kieswetter clears the leg stump and smashes it over long on, superb strike
fuller now and hammered again, this straight along the floor to deep cover, a fumble allows them to come back for two
effort ball here and Kieswetter swings and misses again having stepped to leg
premeditated paddle sweep, Kallis fires it in to off stump, Kieswetter can only block it on the crease, Morgan calls him through for the single
off stump, paddle swept to the 45
down the wicket, smashed straight up in the air and caught by long off coming in 20 yards off the rope, just didn't get it Morgan and pumped it high into the sky and the catch was well held
off stump, flicked into the leg side
just outside off, pushed in front of short third man
paddle swept from off stump, it's in front of deep backward square so they can get a couple with good running
more excellent striking from Kieswetter, again down the pitch and again whacked very very hard, flat six straight down the ground
but oh my goodness what a shot this is, stand and deliver. He shuffles back in the crease and heaves it straight over the bowler's head, it goes miles back, a huge strike
and again! Outside off stump this time and banged straight down the ground again, supreme hitting this, is it Buttler's time now
fuller outside off, slapped just past extra cover for a couple
too wide of off stump now but this is also a no-ball, whoops
yes he does and pulls it off beautifully, gets it well over short long leg and away for four, and another no-ball! Shocking
length outside off stump but Buttler steps outside off and scoops again to fine leg for a one bounce four, super shot again
length on middle stump and this is smashed into the stands over midwicket, another wonderful strike, this is special stuff
another pull out to midwicket, a fumble lets them back for the second
short and smashed over square leg, superbly timed, sails into the stands
now tries the Buttler scoop and gets bowled falling outside off stump, beaten for pace really and a full ball strikes middle and off stumps
full outside off, angled past shot third man, four more, just a little too wide

another middle stump goes flying gets this absolutely bang on does Morkel and Bairstow tried to angle to third man again but missed the fast yorker perfectly on target, there's the Morkel we know and love
fired in to leg stump, tucked to midwicket for just a single
goes for the scoop but just gets it off the toe wide enough of the keeper for the single
